file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 23-32-01-04 - CD PLAYER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL CD PLAYER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the CD player. B. The CD player is installed in the forward galley, zone 232. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ACFT MODEL(S) 23-32-01-000-804-A CD PLAYER - REMOVAL EMB-135 ACFT MODEL(S) 23-32-01-400-804-A CD PLAYER - INSTALLATION EMB-135 EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General CONFIG-2 23-32-01 Page 1 of 7 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-32-01-000-804-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 2. CD PLAYER - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the CD player. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 232 Forward galley C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Forward galley H. Preparation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 841-017-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the circuit breakers listed below and attach a DO- NOT-CLOSE tag to them: • MUSIC (Location Tip: SHED DC BUS 1/SERVICE/MUSIC). • PA (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/COMM/PA). (2) To remove the hot jug slide door (2) and the left track (7) from the hot jug compartment (4), do the steps below: • Open the slide door (2) with the door latch (3). • Lift and push the slide door (2) into the hot jug compartment (4). • Move the pins (5) and pull the slide door (2) from the hot jug compartment (4). • Remove the left track (7) with the screws (6). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-804-A/400 CONFIG-2 23-32-01 Page 2 of 7 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-017-A (1) Remove the screws (14) that attach the CD player compartment (9) to the forward galley (1). (2) Carefully pull the CD player compartment (9) out of the forward galley (1). (3) Disconnect the audio connector (13) from the CD player (11). (4) Disconnect the electrical connector (12) from the CD player (11). (5) Remove the screws (8) that attach the trim face (10) to the CD player compartment (9). (6) Remove the trim face (10). (7) Carefully remove the CD player (11) from the CD player compartment (9). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-804-A/400 CONFIG-2 23-32-01 Page 3 of 7 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 CD Player - Removal/Installation Figure 401 C ZONE 232 B A 1. FORWARD GALLEY 2. SLIDE DOOR 3. DOOR LATCH D 4. HOT JUG DET. A COMPARTMENT 5. PIN 1. FORWARD GALLEY DET. B 8. SCREW (4) 7. LEFT 9. CD PLAYER TRACK COMPARTMENT 6. SCREW DET. D 14. SCREW (4) 13. AUDIO CONNECTOR DET. C 12. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR 10. TRIM FRAME 11. CD PLAYER EM145AMM230207B.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-804-A/400 CONFIG-2 23-32-01 Page 4 of 7 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-32-01-400-804-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 3. CD PLAYER - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the CD player. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-801-A/500 - AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-802-A/500 - AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-804-A/500 - AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-805-A/500 - AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-808-A/500 - AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-809-A/500 - AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-810-A/500 - AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-811-A/500 - AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-812-A/500 - AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-813-A/500 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 232 Forward galley D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Forward galley I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-017-A (1) Carefully install the CD player (11) in the CD player compartment (9). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-804-A/400 CONFIG-2 23-32-01 Page 5 of 7 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Put the trim face (10) in position. (3) Install the screws (8) to attach the trim face (10) to the CD player compartment (9). (4) Connect the audio connector (13) to the CD player (11). (5) Connect the electrical connector (12) to the CD player (11). (6) Carefully install the CD player compartment (9) in the forward galley (1). (7) Install the screws (14) to attach the CD player compartment (9) to the forward galley (1). J. Follow-on (Figure 401) SUBTASK 842-017-A (1) To install the hot jug slide door (2) and the left track (7) to the galley (1), do the steps below: • Install the left track (7) with the screws (6). • Install the slide door (2) with the pins (5). • Pull the slide door (2) to the installation position at the hot jug compartment (4). • Close the slide door (2) with the door latch (3). (2) On the circuit breaker panel, close the circuit breakers listed below and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from them: • MUSIC (Location Tip: SHED DC BUS 1/SERVICE/MUSIC). • PA (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/COMM/PA). (3) (Aircraft with CD player model DEH-245) Do the CD player model DEH-245 operational test (AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-801-A/500) or (AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-802-A/500), if you turn on the CD player with the SOURCE pushbutton. (4) (Aircraft with CD player model DEH-1000) Do the CD player model DEH-1000 operational test (AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-804-A/500) or (AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-805-A/500), if you turn on the CD player with the SOURCE pushbutton. (5) (Aircraft with CD player model DEH-1400) Do the CD player model DEH-1400 operational test (AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-808-A/500). (6) (Aircraft with CD player model DEH-1600) Do the CD player model DEH-1600 operational test (AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-809-A/500). (7) (Aircraft with CD player model DEH-1700) Do the CD player model DEH-1700 operational test (AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-810-A/500). (8) (Aircraft with CD player model DEH-1800) Do the CD player model DEH-1800 operational test (AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-811-A/500). (9) (Aircraft with CD player model DEH-1900) Do the CD player model DEH-1900 operational test (AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-812-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-804-A/400 CONFIG-2 23-32-01 Page 6 of 7 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (10) (Aircraft with CD player model DEH-1300) Do the CD player model DEH-1300 operational test (AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-813-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-804-A/400 CONFIG-2 23-32-01 Page 7 of 7 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
